title: BRIEF-Beroni Group To Launch Its Advanced U.S. FDA-Approved Virus Diagnostic Kit To Help Combat Global Outbreaks Of Zika, Dengue, Chikungunya And West Nile Viruses
text:
BRIEF-Beroni Group To Launch Its Advanced U.S. FDA-Approved Virus Diagnostic Kit To Help Combat Global Outbreaks Of Zika, Dengue, Chikungunya And West Nile Viruses

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 25, 2019 00:35)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Beroni Group To Launch Its Advanced U.S. FDA-Approved Virus Diagnostic Kit To Help Combat Global Outbreaks Of Zika, Dengue, Chikungunya And West Nile Viruses Oct 24 (Reuters) - Beroni Group Ltd BTG.NH : * BERONI GROUP TO LAUNCH ITS ADVANCED US FDA-APPROVED VIRUS DIAGNOSTIC KIT TO HELP COMBAT GLOBAL OUTBREAKS OF ZIKA, DENGUE, CHIKUNGUNYA AND WEST NILE VIRUSES

BRIEF-Beroni Group To Launch Its Advanced U.S. FDA-Approved Virus Diagnostic Kit To Help Combat Global Outbreaks Of Zika, Dengue, Chikungunya And West Nile Viruses
